name: Trenchwitch
description:
In trenches pounded by bombs and seeping with deadly magic, the most dangerous thing is the devil you know.

Please play on a desktop PC for the best experience.

Credits:

  • halfbrick - Writing, QA
  • Parsely - Programming, Editing, Graphic Design
  • Estelle Morningstar - Music
  • DiscoMelon - Cover Art
